org.jasig.cas.adaptors.x509.authentication.handler.support

Interface CRLFetcher

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    LdaptiveResourceCRLFetcher, PoolingLdaptiveResourceCRLFetcher, ResourceCRLFetcher

    public interface CRLFetcher
    Defines operations needed to a fetch a CRL.
    Since:
    4.1
    Author:
    Misagh Moayyed

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      X509CRL fetch(Object crl)
      Fetches a single of crl from the specified resource and returns it.
      Set<X509CRL> fetch(Set<? extends Object> crls)
      Fetches a collection of crls from the specified resources and returns a map of CRLs each tracked by its url.

    • Method Detail

      • fetch

        Set<X509CRL> fetch(@NotNull@Size(min=1)
                 Set<? extends Object> crls)
                   throws Exception
        Fetches a collection of crls from the specified resources and returns a map of CRLs each tracked by its url.
        Parameters:
        crls - resources to retrieve
        Returns:
        map of crl entries and their urls
        Throws:
        Exception - the exception thrown if resources cant be fetched
